title: CTRL0000916070 - Transcribed Interview of John Michael "Mick" Mulvaney, (July 28, 2022)

data.text: JANUARY 6TH ATTACK ON THE U.S. CAPITOL,
The interview in the above matter was held in Room 5480, O'Neill House Office
Representatives Luria, Aguilar, Murphy, Cheney, and Kinzinger.
